title: Manage QA/QC for Lab Assays
description: A geologist manages the Quality Assurance/Quality Control (QA/QC) program for drill samples by submitting standards, blanks, and duplicates to the lab.

tasks.description: Before sending drill samples to the lab, insert certified reference materials (standards) and blanks into the sample sequence.
tasks.expected_outcome: QA/QC samples are correctly inserted into the sample batch.

tasks.description: Receive the assay results from the lab for the entire batch, including the QA/QC samples.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lab results are received and imported.

tasks.description: Analyze the results for the standards and blanks. If a standard's result is outside the acceptable range, flag the batch for a re-assay.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows one of the standards failed, and the corresponding batch of samples is flagged for re-assay at the lab.
